mapper.select: SELECT ------------------------------------------------------- -- 선납사항 ------------------------------------------------------- A.PRM_TN AS PRM_TN -- 선납회차(LC50.LCPCNT) , A.PRM_MCN AS PRM_MCN -- 선납개월(LC50.LCPMON) , A.PRM_DSCR AS PRM_DSCR -- 선납할인율(LC50.LCPRAT) , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PRM_STRT_YM), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRM_STRT_YM -- 선납시작년월 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PRM_END_YM), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRM_END_YM -- 선납종료년월 , A.RENTAL_AMT AS RENTAL_AMT -- 렌탈료1(LC50.LCAMT1) , A.RENTAL_DSC_AMT AS RENTAL_DSC_AMT -- 렌탈할인1(LC50.LCRAM1) , A.PRM_DSC_AMT AS PRM_DSC_AMT -- 선납할인총액(LC50.LCHAMT) , A.TOT_PRM_AMT AS TOT_PRM_AMT -- 선납총액(LC50.LCPAMT) ------------------------------------------------------- -- 매출사항 ------------------------------------------------------- , A.RENTAL_TN AS RENTAL_TN -- 차월(LC50.LCRCNT) , A.NOM_SL_AMT AS NOM_SL_AMT -- 정상매출금액(LC50.LCAM11) , A.RENTAL_DC AS RENTAL_DC -- 렌탈일수(LC50.LCRDAY) , A.SL_DC AS SL_DC -- 매출일수(LC50.LCSDAY) , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CHNG_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHNG_DT -- 교체일자(LC50.LCCHGY) , NVL(A.SPMT_SL_AMT, 0) AS SPMT_SL_AMT -- 추가매출금액(LC50.LCAM12) , NVL(A.NOM_DSC_AMT, 0) AS NOM_DSC_AMT -- 정상할인금액(LC50.LCAM13) , '' AS CAN_CTR_AMT -- 취소조정금액(미셋팅) , '' AS ADN_SV -- 부가서비스(미셋팅) , NVL(A.SPMT_DSC_AMT, 0) AS SPMT_DSC_AMT -- 추가할인금액(LC50.LCAM14) , NVL(A.SL_CTR_AMT, 0) AS SL_CTR_AMT -- 매출조정금액(LC50.LCAM15) , NVL(A.THM_SL_SUM_AMT, 0) AS THM_SL_SUM_AMT -- 매출금액(LC50.LCAM16) , NVL(A.SL_SUM_VAT, 0) AS SL_SUM_VAT -- 매출VAT(LC50.LCAV16) , NVL(A.SL_AGG_AMT, 0) AS SL_AGG_AMT -- 매출누계금액(LC50.LCAM17) , NVL(A.DSC_AGG_AMT, 0) AS DSC_AGG_AMT -- 할인누계금액(LC50.LCAM18) , NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(A.SL_CTR_AMT, 0)) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN), 0) AS CTR_AGG_AMT -- 조정누계금액(LC50.LCAM19) , NVL(C.UC_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT -- 매출잔액(LC50.LCMJAN) ------------------------------------------------------- -- 연체가산금 ------------------------------------------------------- , NVL(D.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT -- 연체가산금(LC50.LCAM81) , NVL(D.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT, 0) AS THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT -- 가산금입금(LC50.LCAM83) , NVL(D.THM_DLQ_ADD_RFND_SUM_AMT, 0) AS THM_DLQ_ADD_RFND_SUM_AMT -- 가산금환불(LC50.LCAM86) , NVL(D.THM_CTR_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS THM_CTR_DLQ_ADD_AMT -- 가산금공제(LC50.LCAM85) , NVL(D.EOT_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS EOT_DLQ_ADD_AMT -- 가산금기말(LC50.LCAM84) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ A -- WELLS매출월마감내역 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ B -- 월별고객서비스대상내역 ON B.MNGT_YM = A.SL_CL_YM AND B.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND B.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_SL_BND_ALRPY_BAS C -- 매출채권반제기본 ON C.BASE_YM = A.SL_CL_YM AND C.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND C.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND C.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS D -- 연체기본 ON D.PERF_YM = A.SL_CL_YM AND D.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND D.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN WHERE A.SL_CL_YM = #{slClYm} AND A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
